document.full_text: the tampa bay lightning swept their season series against the toronto maple leafs with an emphatic 6-2 victory on monday, the win reviving their pursuit of the southeast division crown.
document.title: lightning strikes to trounce wilting leafs
lines_and_colors: the tampa bay lightning swept their season series against the toronto maple leafs with an emphatic 6-2 victory on monday, the win reviving their pursuit of the southeast division crown.
